import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useParams } from 'react-router' import axios from "axios" const InvoiceInfo = (props) => { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [editMenu, setEditMenu] = useState(false) const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ street: "", city: "", zipCode: "", country: "", clientName: "", clientEmail: "", clientCity: "", clientZipCode: "", clientCountry: "", clientStreet: "", paymentDate: "", amount: "", }) let { id } = useParams(); let navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { async function getInvoice() { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/" + id) setData([res.data]); console.log(data); setLoading(false) } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } getInvoice() }, []) function handleClose() { setEditMenu(false) } function handleChange(event) { setFormValue(values => ({ ...values, [event.target.name]: event.target.value })) } const handleDelete = async (_id) => { await axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/" + id) navigate("/") } return ( <> {data.map((item) => ( <> {editMenu &&

New Invoice

{/* X */}

Bill From

Bill To

setFormValue({ ...formValue, paymentDate: event.target.value })} value={item.paymentDate || ""} type="date" />
}
Go Back
Status: PENDING

#{(item._id).slice(0, 6).toUpperCase()}

Invoice Date {(item.createdAt).slice(0, 10)}
Bill to: {item.clientName}A
Sent To: {item.clientEmail}
Payment Date: {item.paymentDate}
{item.clientStreet}
Item Name Quantity Price Total
Pentest 1 Germanay Germanaay
Francisco Chang 1 Francisco Chang 200
200 1 200 200
Amount Due: $ {item.amount}
)) } ) } export default InvoiceInfo
